The Last Emperor

Rank: 149


Bernardo Bertolucci's Oscar-winning dramatization of China's eleventh and final monarch of the Qing dynasty: Emperor Puyi.


Director: Bernardo Bertolucci

Writer: Enzo Ungari, Mark Peploe, Bernardo Bertolucci

Stars: John Lone, Joan Chen, "Peter OToole

Tags: Docudrama, Historical Epic, Period Drama, Biography, Drama, History
